document.full_text: video game maker thq inc said it sold 375,000 copies of its new military-themed video "homefront" on the first day of sales in north america.
document.title: "homefront" videogame sells 375,000 on first day
lines_and_colors: video game maker thq inc said it sold 375,000 copies of its new military-themed video "homefront" on the first day of sales in north america.
